name: SmartWork
longDescription: SmartWork是一個提供企業用戶使用的內部對話機器人服務。若你的企業已有授權使用它，在登入企業帳號之後，你就可以在Teams上使用對話的方式詢問它Microsoft 365的問題，包含如何操作、疑難排解等。SmartWork建立在Microsoft對話AI技術和Microsoft Graph API的基礎上，擁有上下文推理、自動學習、推薦和預測分析，能協助企業內部用戶能更快且精準的了解問題並給予問題的回答。 SmartWork也可以串接企業中常用的內部管理系統，提供專屬於內部部門系統的對話服務，讓企業內部員工可以透過跟SmartWork對話就能完成工作日常中的大小事，例如：串接人力資源系統協助差勤上下班打卡核對，IT技術部門支援解決簡單電腦或網路問題，知識管理系統協助員工查詢內部文件與資料等。若您想了解更多有關SmartWork的應用與合作，歡迎來信 sales@intumit.com 與我們聯絡。
shortDescription: SmartWork是一個能回答Microsoft 365相關問題的對話機器人

localizedDefinitions.name: SmartWork
localizedDefinitions.longDescription: SmartWork is a versatile and personalized internal assistant for enterprise users. Integrated through Microsoft Graph, Intumit's Microsoft Teams based Conversational AI assists Microsoft 365 users in a dialogue-based fashion through core technologies in contextual reasoning, reinforcement learning, recommending knowledge, and predictive analytics for enterprises. SmartWork can connect with management systems, such as HR systems, IT Helpdesk, and more. Please contact us for further info: sales@intumit.com.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: SmartWork: a Conversational AI to solve Microsoft 365 questions

localizedDefinitions.name: SmartWork
localizedDefinitions.longDescription: SmartWork adalah asisten internal berbasis dialog bagi anggota perusahaan. Melalui integrasi dengan Microsoft Graph, asisten percakapan AI Intumit dapat membantu pengguna Microsoft 365 dengan teknologi terdepan seperti, penalaran kontekstual, penguatan pengetahuan, rekomendasi pengetahuan, dan analitik prediktif bagi perusahaan. SmartWork dapat disambungkan dengan berbagai sistem manajemen seperti, sistem HR, IT Helpdesk, dan sebagainya. Hubungi kami di: sales@intumit.com untuk informasi lebih lanjut.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: SmartWork: AI percakapan untuk solusi Microsoft 365

localizedDefinitions.name: SmartWork
localizedDefinitions.longDescription: SmartWorkは企業向けの内部対話型ロボットサービスです。Microsoftの Conversational AI技術とMicrosoft Graph APIに基づき、会話を通してユーザーのOffice 365の操作問題を解決します。上下文脈関連、機械学習、レコメンドや予測分析といった機能を有し、社内ユーザーがより迅速かつ正確に問題を解決できるようにサポートします。また、SmartWorkは、人事管理システム、IT技術部サポート、ナレッジマネジメントシステム等、企業内でよく使用されるシステムと連携し、部門別の内部対話サービスを提供できます。SmartWorkのさらなる活用方法についてもっと知りたい場合は、sales@intumit.comにご連絡ください。
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: SmartWorkは、Microsoft 365関連の問題を解決する対話型ロボットです。

localizedDefinitions.name: SmartWork
localizedDefinitions.longDescription: SmartWork가 기업 사용자를 위해 다용도와 각 기업마다 맞출 수 있는 내부 서비스를 제공합니다. Intumit의 Microsoft Teams는 Microsoft Graph를 통합하여 대화형 인공지능 기반이고 기업을 위해 Microsoft 365 사용자들에게 문맥 추론,강화 학습,지식 추천 및 예측 분석의 서비스를 제공드립니다. SmartWork는 인적 자원 관리 시스템, IT 헬프 데스크 등 관리 시스템과 연결할 수 있습니다. SmartWork에 관해 자세한 내용을 얻기 원하시면 언제든지 저희에게 문의주시기 바랍니다: sales@intumit.com
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: SmartWork: Microsoft 365 사용자의 문제를 해결하기 위해 만든 AI 채팅봇입니다.

localizedDefinitions.name: SmartWork

localizedDefinitions.longDescription: SmartWork สร้างขึ้นด้วย Microsoft Teams เป็นส่วนหนึ่งของ Microsoft Conversational AI technologies โดยใช้ Microsoft Graph API ที่ช่วยเหลือผู้ใช้ Microsoft 365 ด้วยคำพูดที่ทันสมัย มีเหตุผล ให้ความรู้ และการวิเคราะห์คาดการณ์ เข้าใจในความต้องการของลูกค้ามากขึ้น SmartWork ยังติดต่อกับระบบการจัดการทั่วไป เช่น ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล ฝ่ายช่วยเหลือด้านไอที ระบบการจัดการด้านความรู้ ฯลฯ สามารถติดต่อกับเราได้ทางอีเมล : sales@intumit.com
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: SmartWork เป็นหุ่นยนต์ตอบโต้ สำหรับ Microsoft365 โดยเฉพาะ

localizedDefinitions.name: SmartWork
localizedDefinitions.longDescription: SmartWork, kurumsal kullanıcılar için dahili bir diyalog robot hizmetidir. Microsoft Dialogue AI teknolojisine ve Microsoft Graph API'ye dayanır ve kullanıcıların Microsoft 365 işlemi ve kullanımı ile ilgili karşılaştıkları sorunları çözmelerine yardımcı olmak için kullanılır. Bağlamsal muhakeme, otomatik öğrenme, öneri ve tahmine dayalı analiz ile, kuruluştaki dahili kullanıcıların sorunları daha hızlı ve doğru bir şekilde ele almalarına yardımcı olur. SmartWork ayrıca insan kaynakları sistemleri, BT teknik departmanı desteği ve bilgi yönetim sistemleri gibi dahili sistemlere entegre olarak daha verimli bir çalışma ortamı oluşturmaya yardımcı olur. SmartWork uygulaması hakkında daha fazla bilgi edinmek istiyorsanız, lütfen sales@intumit.com adresine yazıp bizimle iletişime geçininiz.
localizedDefinitions.shortDescription: SmartWork, Microsoft 365 sorunlarını çözmenize yardımcı olan bir robottur.
